channel.title: Linux Kernel on Chris Titus Tech | Tech Content Creator
channel.description: Recent content in Linux Kernel on Chris Titus Tech | Tech Content Creator

item.title: Common Computer Issues
item.description: These are all the issues we discussed on a live stream. I took all the community questions and made this webpage for them.

item.title: Custom Kernel in Linux
item.description: This Guide walks your through how to install a custom kernel on Linux. I will go over performing this in a Debian-based system and an Arch-based system. Please note that the arch based system requires you to build the kernel yourself and will take much longer.
